description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Empoli vs Cagliari in the Serie A
title: Empoli vs Cagliari: Serie A stats & head-to-head
title_page: Empoli vs Cagliari: Serie A stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Booking
Leonardo Pavoletti (Cagliari) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Booking
Tommaso Augello (Cagliari) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Post
Attempt missed. Matteo Prati (Cagliari) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Florinel Coman.
